page.title: 14ESSO
page.content: oil (4)aviation fuel.The main product is petrol which is about 30% of the produce.ESSOs products go out by lorry,boat,train and pipeline.3% goes out by lorry,44% by boat,3% by train and 50% by pipeline. They are building a new pipeline through the new forest.The pipeline is going all over the country.It will be about a 120 miles long when finished. And more products will go out by pipeline. Most of the product comes in from abroad.95% of crude oil comes in from the north sea,5% from Saudi Arabia.This year 20 apprentices taken on as pipeline fitters,electricians and procesing operators. ESSO are very safety concious and a lot of time and money is spent on minermising the fire hazard and security is very tight.
